title: I realise it's predominantly memeing/wishful thinking
body:
But shouldn't Kkoma be credited too?
Riot agreed that Easyhoon was more than a substitute, and hence got his skin, so will Kkoma get such acknowledgement? Especially considering coaches are more actively involved in the game (picks and bans) than they used to be.
Would SKTeemo really be that big of a hassle?

replies.body: Idk, that depends, is blank getting a skin even though bengi is the starter?
youd assume he is. He saw more play than Easyhoon
